name: Born (itch) (Kerkzy-)
description:
Born is a hand-drawn adventure following a Wildlife Conservator as they embark on dangerous journey in Malaysia Forest. You will represent as a Malaysia Wildlife Conservator. You will begin your journey in Malaysia Forest and find out what has happened in Malaysia Forest and experience the difficulties with them. You can feel the environment and change of Malaysia Forest. 

Features:

- Hand-drawn Art that enhance visual effects of forest.
- Unique Gameplay that combine with Interesting Storyline.
- Relaxing Background Music.
- Explore varied Environment from Forest to Concrete Jungle.
- A touching adventure of wildlife trying to survive in Human Threat.
- Born acute environmental topics, including Deforestation, Hunting, Palm Oil
  Plantation and Roadkill.
